page.title: 03Melville Mains Farm.
page.content: 1 An interview with{Farmer King}from{ {Melville Mains Farm}Lasswade. {David}"What's the farm's name?" {Farmer}"Melville Mains Farm Lasswade" {David}"How many acres do you own?" {Farmer}"200 acres" {David}"What do you grow?" {Farmer}"Grass for the animals" {David}"How many people are employed here?" {Farmer}"2 people" {David}"Do you have any animals?" {Farmer}"Yes,cows,2 bulls and some young stock" {David}"Do you have any farm machinery?" {Farmer}"Yes,Tractors,2 bailors, seeders,Ploughs,Harrows,Rollers, Rotervater,Dung Spreader and a Dung loader. David Tracey.
